name: stylelint-config-equinusocio
description: Stylelint configuration based on my experience and taste
author: Mattia Astorino

scripts.release:major: git pull && standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags && yarn pub
scripts.release:patch: git pull && standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags && yarn pub
scripts.release:minor: git pull && standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags && yarn pub
